sentences.en: Destroy the people's faith in their natural leaders by holding the latter up to contempt, ridicule and obloquy.
sentences.cn: 摧毁人民对他们当然领袖的信仰，代之以轻蔑、嘲笑和漫骂。

sentences.en: I have had enough obloquy for one lifetime ( Anthony Eden )
sentences.cn: 我一辈子受够了诽谤 ( 安东尼伊登 )

sentences.en: I have had enough obloquy for one lifetime.
I resent the obloquy that you are casting upon my reputation.
sentences.cn: 我怨恨漫骂您是铸造了我的声誉.

sentences.en: In the Xixi local police station office at Chen Mou to obloquy.
sentences.cn: 在西溪派出所办公室里,苏某指着陈某大骂.
